text_block_list.name: Television
text_block_list.text:
Also seen at the Embassy of<n>Ireland's gala yesterday was
a<n>distinguished young guest currently<n>studying abroad at
the Japan<n>Umamusume Training Center<n>Academy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That was the first time I heard of<n>her—a news snippet
blaring from a TV<n>in an electronics store window.

Hmm... What should I do? ...Oh!<n>Pardon, may I have a
moment of your<n>time?

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Indeed I do. Hehe, I'm terribly sorry<n>to have startled you. I
was hoping to<n>consult a local about something.

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You see, I heard that this convenience<n>shop had a dining
counter. I purchased<n>a cup of ramen and took it to a seat,<n>
but...

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I'm afraid the server never came to<n>prepare the noodles.
Would you<n>happen to know if the dining service<n>is closed
today?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm about as perplexed as she is, but<n>I explain that
convenience stores have<n>hot-water dispensers for
customers to<n>make the ramen themselves.

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Eh? I get to make it myself?! Me,<n>making ramen?! Why,
that... that...

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that sounds wonderful! If I may<n>ask, where might I find
this hot-water<n>dispenser?

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Sigh. That was such a lovelyexperience! To have shopping,cooking, and dining services all in oneshop—it really is convenient!

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I cannot thank you enough for your<n>kind guidance. ♪ Now, if
I may ask...

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Could I trouble you to escort me to<n>Ramen Rampage?

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
...Oh, no, I'm sorry! Ehehe, it seems I<n>got ahead of myself. A
local student<n>would look the route up online,<n>wouldn't
they?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I mean... yeah, probably. But her way<n>of saying it leaves me
slightly<n>concerned—it's like she's never<n>stepped out into
the real world before.
choice_data_list: I can show you the way.

text_block_list.name: Owner of Ramen Joint
text_block_list.text: ...Seiyaaa!

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Did he... He did! He just did the<n>Rampage Colander
Cross! I can't<n>believe I'm seeing it live!

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yes! It's the technique he uses to<n>drain the starchy water
he boiled the<n>ramen in. It preserves the integrity of<n>the
noodles' texture and the flavor of<n>the rich chicken stock!

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
When I read about it online, I just<n>knew I had to see it for
myself! Ahhh...<n>It was worth the forty-three-day wait!

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
The glistening beads of water, cast<n>vigorously into flight but
inches from<n>my eyes... The chef's passion stokes<n>the
appetite more than I ever could<n>have imagined!

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I truly cannot thank you enough for<n>escorting me. You have
my deepest<n>gratitude!
choice_data_list:
I'm glad to hear it, but I really didn't do
anything special...

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but you did. I have no doubt I'll be<n>cherishing this
experience for the rest<n>of my life!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing the pure excitement in her<n>eyes... For some reason, I
feel like the<n>moment will linger in my memory too.

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's almost sundown! That's a<n>shame. I was thinking to
squeeze in<n>one more stop.
choice_data_list:
There's still plenty of time before the dorm's
curfew.

There's still plenty of time before the dorm's
curfew.

text_block_list.name: Regal Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I know, but it's not the dormitory's<n>curfew I'm—Oh.

...Your Highness, please pardon the<n>intrusion, but your
excursion was only<n>permitted on the grounds that you<n>
would return by sunset. Please make<n>your way to the
dormitory.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Next thing I know, we're surrounded<n>by impending figures
in suits. Where<n>did they all come from?!

text_block_list.name: Suit-clad Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
And you—it was not our intent to<n>disturb your conversation.
However...

text_block_list.name: Suit-clad Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Our charge, Fine Motion, descends<n>from a royal bloodline.
Though her<n>noble house has since come to reside<n>in
Ireland...
choice_data_list: W-wait, back up. She's a descendant of royalty?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...Thank you for your concern,<n>Captain. I'll return to the
dormitory as<n>soon I finish thanking my gracious<n>host.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. I hope my security didn't scare<n>you. Thank you again
for everything. I<n>made some truly wonderful memories<n>
today!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Please take this as a token of my<n>appreciation.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She places something in my palm<n>with a firm handshake
and then turns<n>to leave, allowing the security guards<n>to
lead her away to the station.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Frozen from shock, it's not until they<n>leave that I'm able to
look at what she<n>gave me. It's...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A Ramen Rampage coupon.
